import React, { useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { CardContent } from "@material-ui/core"; import { InputField, CustomCard, ActionButton, Text, EmailPreview } from "./Materials"; import EmailService from "../../services/EmailService" import UserProfile from "../../contexts/UserProfile"; const Email = () => { const [profile, setProfile] = useContext(UserProfile); const subjectRef = React.createRef(); const ccRef = React.createRef(); const bccRef = React.createRef(); const recipientsRef = React.createRef(); const namesRef = React.createRef(); const positionsRef = React.createRef(); const messageRef = React.createRef(); let emailContent = {}; function handleClick(){ emailContent['email'] = profile; emailContent[''] emailContent['subject'] = subjectRef.current.children[1].children[0].value; emailContent['cc'] = ccRef.current.children[1].children[0].value; emailContent['bcc'] = bccRef.current.children[1].children[0].value; emailContent['recipients'] = recipientsRef.current.children[1].children[0].value; emailContent['names'] = namesRef.current.children[1].children[0].value; emailContent['positions'] = positionsRef.current.children[1].children[0].value; emailContent['message'] = messageRef.current.children[1].children[0].value; console.log("clicked") EmailService.sendEmail(JSON.stringify(emailContent)); } return (
Email Information
Browse
Send Messages
Email Preview
Hello testing
); }; export default Email;
